mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_inference_ear_info ( json_data, gen_by, gen_dt ) values ( #{json_data}, #{gen_by}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.json_data , t1.gen_by , t2.user_nm , t1.gen_dt , extract(year from t1.gen_dt) as year , extract(month from t1.gen_dt) as month , extract(day from t1.gen_dt) as day FROM t_inference_ear_info t1 INNER JOIN t_user_info t2 ON t1.gen_by = t2.user_code WHERE 1=1 AND t2.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY gen_dt DESC

SELECT t1.seq , t1.img_file , t1.ear_pos , t5.cd_val AS ear_pos_nm , t2.user_code , t3.user_code , t1.gen_dt , CASE WHEN t4.f_relation IS NULL THEN '본인' ELSE t4.f_relation END AS f_relation FROM t_inference_info t1 INNER JOIN t_user_info t2 ON t1.gen_by = t2.user_id INNER JOIN t_user_info t3 ON t1.user_id = t3.user_code LEFT OUTER JOIN t_user_family_mapp t4 ON t2.user_code = t4.o_user_code AND t3.user_code = t4.f_user_code INNER JOIN t_cm_cd t5 ON t1.ear_pos = t5.cd AND t5.cat_cd = 'EAR_POS' WHERE 1=1 AND t1.gen_by = #{user_id} ORDER BY t1.gen_dt DESC
